result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tony L Ballard

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.

;l[ml] Case called at 8:50AM
Defendant Tony L Ballard appears via telephone. Attorney Amber Rumpf appears in court. ADA Krysta Parson appears for the State of Wisconsin.
This hearing is scheduled for a Preliminary Hearing, however the Defendant appears via telephone.

Att Rumpf advises that the Defendant had transportation issues that prevented him from appearing, and requests this file be rescheduled at a time a date that would sync up with the co-defendant's file. The State does not object, but notes that it has an officer witness present for testimony today.

The Court tolls Preliminary Hearing time limits and resets this matter.

recess 8:54AM

NEXT: Preliminary Hearing 11/15 at 9:00AM with in person appearances

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Modifying Bond

ec/pc: DA, SPD, Def, JCJ(9/23/22--ma)
Preliminary hearing on September 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

[MK] case called at 1:26pm 
Defendant Tony L Ballard appears via videoconferencing from the Jefferson County Jail, in custody, along with Public Defender Amber Rumpf (the PD will appoint counsel).  DA  Monica Hall appears for the State of Wisconsin. 
The Court finds that the video-connection is sight and sound sufficient. 

Attorney Rumpf indicates that the Liberty Street address is current, however there is no apartment number at that address. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charges and maximum penalties are recited.
The Court will schedule Preliminary Hearing within the time limit as requested by the Defense.
The Court requires a $500 Cash Bond with conditions:
--no contact with the Co-Defendant  Julie A Janis
--to remain absolutely sober
--no possession or ingestion of controlled substances without a valid prescription
recess 1:43pm. 

NEXT: (1) clerk- please add the Jefferson Public Defenders Office to the mailing matrix,  (2) Preliminary Hearing on September 30th at 8:30am  [clerk's inserted note: during the hearing it was indicated that Mr. Ballard is now in custody on a DOC hold]

ADDRESS INFO for Tony L Ballard
Current: 834 Liberty St., La Crosse, WI 54603 United States  (Effective: 09-22-2022)
Prior: 834 Liberty St, Apt 9, Lacrosse, WI 54603
